Reviews.Title: Incredible Camera
Reviews.Author: Paulette Angove
Reviews.Content: I was debating between the Nikon D7000 and the D3200 to replace my worn D60. For the money, I am delighted that I chose the D3200. It's light weight, and quiet.The tutoring menu is more for beginners, and it has many pre-sets to take creative shots easily. Love the 24MP, and find no noise even shooting at 6400 ISO.I bought it to shoot stills, but it has excellent HD video with slow motion.You do have to run manual with the older lenses, but that has only caused me to up my game.It's the most excellent DSLR value currently available!!

Reviews.Title: Water Polo Mamarazzi Recommended
Reviews.Author: Rebecca C. Teensma "US Pinay"
Reviews.Content: Used this camera to take pictures of my daughter's water polo games.  Pictures were fantastic!  Good camera for people who love taking pictures but have no time to muck around with understanding all the camera's technicalities.  Having a 24 megapixel resolution allow real tight cropping without loss of clarity.  Must have!

Reviews.Title: My camera looks and operates as advertised....
Reviews.Author: Gary Causer
Reviews.Content: The camera was reconditioned like new. Worked great right out of the box. And I saved a couple of hundred bucks. What's not to like?

Reviews.Title: Best cheapest DSLR on the market!
Reviews.Author: Sole
Reviews.Content: I have been using this DSLR for about 9 months heavily. I use it mainly forportraits on the beach with a lot of dust, salt, air, humidity and sun of course.From my point of view this specific camera can give a professional looking images.It has never let me down and i paid it of in 7 days :-).I normally use it with toking 11-16mm, nikkor 17-55mm f2.8 and nikkor 50mm 1.8G.I highly recommend it to all the newbies.Cheers

Reviews.Title: Super resolution
Reviews.Author: Thomas R. Dunning
Reviews.Content: I have had a d70 for a long time and I love it. The d3200 is smaller and lighter. Operation is very easy and it will show me anything I don't know. The most remarkable thing is the resolution. 24 megapixels. The pictures I take are absolutely beautiful. At $500 for the body only (I have lenses) it is a great deal.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: bakranz
Reviews.Content: Enjoying it so far. Beyond my expectations of what I was looking for. It is a wonderful camera for me

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cam Body for the Price
Reviews.Author: flatiron'er
Reviews.Content: Great DSLR body for beginners stepping outside the "Auto" realm for the price. I wouldn't bother ever purchasing a kit lens with any camera.  Body is the only way to go, as kit lenses are never worth a darn.

Reviews.Title: Looked brand spankin new!
Reviews.Author: zook Montague
Reviews.Content: This is by far the best camera i have ever had! Works wonders! Thank you so much! Im gonna go shoot all the time!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: bill
Reviews.Content: As advertised, looks, feels and works as a brand new camera. Great deal, only needed body as I already had lenses from my D3100. Nice inexpensive upgrade!  Vendor was very responsive with my two inquiries.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: C. DICKSON
Reviews.Content: Perfect for personal or professional use. The D3200 has very similar technology to more expensive bodies. Save yourself the money, purchase this camera and use the extra money to buy nice glass and that's all you're going to need.

Reviews.Title: Excellent in all respects
Reviews.Author: Ashton Brereton
Reviews.Content: For about two years now I have been using for bird photography, a Nikon D3000 mated to 1,4 Teleconverter and an AF-S Nikkor 300mm lens. I decided that it was time for me to upgrade but I wanted to do so at reasonable cost and easy carrying weight. So after doing my research I decided on the D3200. I made the correct choice. I find that it has more or less the same feel and weight of the D3000 and my teleconverter and lens work  perfectly with it. Additionally, apart from the major upgrade in pixels per image, it focuses very quickly, takes multiple frames in a flash and is ready to shoot even while it is still saving data from a previous shot. The picture quality is very high and if required the supplied software - or any similar ones for that matter - allows for all the usual computer processing, I recommend it unreservedly.

Reviews.Title: Used camera
Reviews.Author: Michael Long
Reviews.Content: the camera was refurbished and so far it's been great....... Love the camera,  It looks like a brand new camera right out of the box.  I'll order another one when that time comes.  Great price,  and wonderful camera

Reviews.Title: GREAT VALUE
Reviews.Author: Arnold T. Serrata "Nolo Serrata"
Reviews.Content: A great value; excellent camera that more than met my expectation for a more than fair price.  I am totally happy with the results of this camera paired with the Nikon 40mm micro dx, the Nikon 18-105mm vr dx and soon the Nikon 55-300 vr dx lenses.  The pictures are easy to take and are clear and colorful, both outdoors and indoors and day or night.  Amazon.com made it happen; convenient, safe, and delivers on time according to plan.

Reviews.Title: Nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: As I See It today "Scifi n Mystery Guy"
Reviews.Content: I have been taking pictures for 46 years starting with a Kodak 620 reflex film camera.  In college I upgraded to a Contax 139 Quartz.  This was treat for a serious hobbyist.  It took many years after digital imaging arrived before I put a toe in the water.  My wife and I picked up a cheap point and shoot 3mP for a vacation.  One of the shots won an award at a local festival.  This changed my mind about digital.As an interim jump we picked the FugiFilm FinePix S9000.  What makes this camera shine is the FinePix picture engine, great low light and flash photos and a comfortable sealed unit.  It also uses AA batteries that can be purchased anywhere.  These features make it a great camera for travel everywhere.  Poster sized enlargements can be made without distortion.  The downside is that the LCD is small and the eye piece is not through the lens.It was time to upgrade to a true D-SLR.  After conducting extensive research we set our sights on the Nikon line.  Comparing Nikon feature to feature with the competition most things were equal except Nikon cameras felt better in my hands.  The controls, handling and balance were close to my old Contax 139Q.So far the photos have been very good.  The option to go semi or full manual opens up a world of creativity.  Having the ability to work with RAW files also expands artistic options.  I am very pleased with the speed, flexibility and functionality of this unit.  Can't wait to get the WiFi adapter working with an Android device.  The software for this is only available at Google Play for Android.  Make sure your tablet, phone meet the requirements before purchasing the WiFi Device.

Reviews.Title: Camera Great--service not so much
Reviews.Author: Gail Schmidt
Reviews.Content: The camera is a good one, love the features, but the seller failed to get it to the UPS store in the necessary time limits for me to receive it on the LATEST expected date. I had to fight with UPS to try to get it to me faster before an important trip.

Live View
Up To ISO 12800
